HomeWiki:
Project Description
OpenADM is collection of Tools and a System Framework that provides specifications to develop, build and operate a legal Windows-based "distro".

The main OpenADM goals are:
  1. Provide a balanced technology-mix in order to deliver good quality, reliable, highly-automated and low cost services.
  2. Provide a low-cost, secure and manageable framework for users and IT staff in an increasingly complex environment.
  3. Provide a high degree of operational automation.
OpenADM is a ThinkInBig project and can be reached at: http://thinkinbig.org/.
